website_summaries.verdict: An affordable puffer jacket with heat-trapping technology that keeps you really warm.
pros: Excellent ratings for warmth in winter weather
Reflective lining traps in body heat without making you sweat
Roomy and a good fit for larger men
Non-down insulation better for wet weather, though this jacket is not technically water resistant
cons: Consider purchasing a size down because runs large

customer_reviews.title: Warm and great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Had this a week, high temp for the week of about 6 degrees, but wore it at 12 below zero. And it has been warm even wearing a tee shirt only under it. With pockets unzipped, can feel the cold wind just a bit. Zip them shut, cold goes away. I have not spent hours outside in this jacket. 20 minutes or so. But it stayed warm. Really light material. I'm 603 and 285 lbs, and the XXL fits perfect. Hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Laram

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket for a skinny teen!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6'1" and about 160 lbs, he's very tal and slim. I ordered the size medium size reviews said the jacket runs big. The medium fits perfectly. This is a really nice jacket, looks stylish yet casual, and seems like it will keep a skinny kid warm in winter.
customer_reviews.author: BreeElle

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: I like this jacket. Light weight and it keeps my warm (30 degrees with just a tshirt underneath). I normally wear XL or XXL in most shirts or jackets and the XL fits me perfectly. I wish it had a hood, or even better, a detachable hood.
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: Runs large and long
customer_reviews.text: If you're interested in this jacket, definitely order a size down from your normal jacket size, because as others have noted, this runs a full size large. Unfortunately it also runs longer than is described, so if you don't want close to a short parka length, don't buy this. I'm 6'3" with a long torso and this jacket was still too long for my like, coming down below the bottom end of my cheeks, so I returned it. Seems like it would be a good jacket, and quite warm
customer_reviews.author: nhmtnbkr

customer_reviews.title: BIG
customer_reviews.text: Jacket was very large and boxey. Wanted to return for a smaller size but color was not available. I would size down if you are considering purchasing this coat.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mangan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Super warm and comfortable jacket- not too puffy but very warm- husband loves it- wore it to the UK in March, will wear again in Montana in June. Just what he was looking for. He’s 6’4” 225 and we got a large and it’s a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great coat but not super warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as other reviews said it was very warm. I wore it with a sweater and undershirt underneath on a 30 degree windy day and it wasn't adequate. Since then I've been wearing it over usual undershirt/long sleeves along with a fleece jacket and that makes it warm enough. I like all the zippered pockets and softly lined waist pockets for my hands. Very comfortable and fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Buy Normal Size if wearing sweater underneath
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of this coat, but it was too small. I believed the reviews that said to buy a size smaller. This is not true, especially if you want to wear a sweater or sweatshirt underneath. Even with just a t shirt it is tight under the arms.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Oklahoma

customer_reviews.title: waaayy to big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a jacket in a medium, it was way to big. Went to a local store and got the same exact jacket for less money in the same size and it fit perfect. I do not think that it was authentic or just marked terribly wrong. Too bad because it was a Christmas gift. My money was refunded quickly though.
customer_reviews.author: alainamac

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and WARM!!
customer_reviews.text: Jacket fits well and is very lightweight and warm. Have worn in 12 degree weather with just a tee shirt and was really warm. Only thing I don’t really like is the collar won’t lie down. But overall very happy with the OmniHeat.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Card

customer_reviews.title: A good buy !
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son, who dislikes heavy, bulky winter coats. He LOVES it!! Especially the Omni heat lining that extends into the sleeves. He says it feels like a cloud. I like that it’s Columbia, and the Omni heat...a win-win, and the price was great! He’s a 2XL but we returned for a XL, and that fit him perfectly. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Columbia does it again
customer_reviews.text: This coat by Columbia is a wonderful value for the money. My son is a big man 220 and this coat in size XXL fit him perfectly. The lining is reflective material that helps radiate body heat quickly and the sleeves have velcro bands that close so cold air doesn't get in. This coat is a winner in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetreet

customer_reviews.title: Size down!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a medium and it was HUGE. Reordered a small and it fit my son perfectly! He loves the jacket! He is 5’10” 150 lbs. usually wears a large shirt but a small in this jacket was the right size
customer_reviews.author: JulieB

customer_reviews.title: Good buy! Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket and of course it’s a good! Worth the money I’ll wait for that comment. Gotta use it more then a few times! Arrived on time because it was needed foe my trip out west, at least I thought so, wore once out there but was nice and warm. However it was only 45 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: VERY warm..!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband's new Winter jacket, perfect for the coldest NYC weather. He especially likes the metallic lining, and the high neck closure. Roomy enough for a sweater underneath, although he found it warm enough without one, even in the recent snowstorm, and coldsnap. Looks great, too..!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pasquale

customer_reviews.title: Decent jacket
customer_reviews.text: My husband's only complaint was that it was a teensy bit bulkier than he wanted. While it is much smaller than other jackets it was still a little Fuller than he liked. It is very light weight and fit well in our travel suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, but returned because it was much to large.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return because it was way to large for the person that I had gotten it for, it was about two sizes to large. His specs: 200 lbs. 5’8”. But, the quality was excellent as is every Columbia jacket we’ve ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Chapulin

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, durable, and most importantly  WARM!
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket! Bought it to be able to get through the east coast winter since I travel CA to NJ often. However, it does run a bit on the larger side. If you’re in between sizes opt for the smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Warm and light weight...A Minnesota woman VERY happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Warm! I love this coat. I live in Minnesota where temps get WELL below zero, and I feel comfortably warm. If I have layers on, I don’t even feel the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Columbia merchandise has great quality; you don't have to worry about if you going to need extra clothing to stay warm when wearing; you won't.
customer_reviews.author: Namika A. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you cannot beat this winter jacket. It has great insulation, not too puffy. Keep you comfortable even on very cold windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice warm jacket. I was concerned about sizing because I am 6-4 and about 215, but ordered an XL and it fits me well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Very Big.
customer_reviews.text: Very big. I usually wear a xxl but had to return. XL fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Was my first jacket with the Omni heat technology. Didn't know what to expect. I love it! Super comfy and warm. Like most, I wish it had inside pockets. But still love it. Totally worth $75 bucks on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bronk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The size is too big And if it was good for me it was perfect. Gave it to people who have needs
customer_reviews.author: nir

customer_reviews.title: BIG!!’
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my usual size medium, fit like a large. Sending back...
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Omni heat works
customer_reviews.text: This jack is really good for the prize and it’s really warm for winter. Below 30s, it works great. I will have to just remind people that if you are a medium order small and if you wear large order a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coat that keeps you warm. Wish it would have had a detachable hood...but I've got hats and beanies so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaJ

customer_reviews.title: It is really warm...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good size. Got xxl because my husband is tall. It is a good length, just below his bottom. It kept him warm in 6 degree windy weather.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great winter coat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, Columbia quality is great and very warm! We have some of the harshest winters in Minnesota and this coat is made for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Small people watch out, small size is big
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket well made it but I bought the small one and still big for my size so I returned the item but good quality, the arms are so longer
customer_reviews.author: Hector S

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very warm coat at a reasonable price. Nice looking also.
customer_reviews.author: norvito velez

customer_reviews.title: Great price on this one
customer_reviews.text: I generally wear extra large shirts and jackets. if I were to buy this jacket again I would probably go large as opposed to extra large, it is a bit big. Although the sleeves have Velcro whereas I can cinch up the arms. It is a very warm jacket, I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Nice n toasty
customer_reviews.text: Warm but I recommend hooded version for total warmth. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Decent value if it's on sale
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Lightweight Great material Comfort Cons: Wish it has a hooded part Design could be better
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Warm not Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and comfortable. The Omni-Heat lining is no joke, it keeps you warm without adding weight.
customer_reviews.author: DRehard

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 11 months ago. The jacket is light weight and will keep you warm even on the coldest of days. However, the material cheap and tears easily. If you bump into anything the lining will puncture in a heartbeat. Save your money and spend it on a better quality jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Went camping in 15 degree weather and with a sweatshirt on underneath was very warm.
customer_reviews.author: SG from VA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he looks great in it. It is a very warm jacket.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lavere

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hubby
customer_reviews.text: Husband very happy with fit and warmth. He usually wears large but the Medium fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Columbia needs to fix the sizing on this. I am 5-11, 160 with a 41” chest. Ordered medium and I am swimming in this. Every other medium from Columbia fits well or even a little snug. Will be returning. This review is not a reflection of the product’s quality, which is probably good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and light
customer_reviews.text: This coat gets very toasty. Very ideal for Ohio winters. It runs big so buy a size down. I’m 6’0 220 and I fit comfortably into a large. There’s an interior zip pocket by the zipper which is nice to have. It is very light and water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jacket. As other comments mentioned, it is a bit big, but not overwhelmingly so. I would recommend getting the suggested size listed according to your measurements from the size chart. I followed it according to my waist size. A good amount of room and very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but the zipper gets caught in the fabric when zipping it. Also took 1 size smaller than usual.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: The sizes are wrong
customer_reviews.text: We sent back because the size is not really right.
customer_reviews.author: Gjosheva

customer_reviews.title: Great coat
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a Christmas gift and he loves it. He looks really nice in it too.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Warm & waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket fit awesome!! I wore it in the snow and it was warm, waterproof and cozy. I would recommend this jacket to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Neville Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied man
customer_reviews.text: Husband absolutely loved this coat. Very warm. Hasn’t had a new winter coat in years. Very picky.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Size doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: The jacket isn't in my size. I have a Colombia softshell size M witch sits perfectly on me. So I ordered the jacket in size M and it's very big, like a L or XL. I can't wear it.. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this puffer he is worm light and comfortable... I am 1.83 meter 84 kg bigger than average shoulder and I took medium size fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ohad perets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful, comfortable,fits perfect, very warm and light thank you I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: Ada L Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Fitsgreat
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and my son said the fit was good and it was warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cleone Peterson

customer_reviews.title: didnt last more than one winter
customer_reviews.text: after first winter season a bunch of holes start to pop up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Dad, great fit, he says it’s way warmer that any other coat he has
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: It was too big I chose the M size and it's too big, and in terms of warmth, it's not as warm as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: BANDAR

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift but he appetite like it slot. He was able to move with comfort
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Warm but lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my son who lives in Alaska. He loves it! It fits true to size and is effective against the cold and wind
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Warm and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and warm, a heavy sweater or long sleeve shirt worn underneath this jacket might be too warm for some people. Worth the $
customer_reviews.author: TAdams

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband! He totally loved it! It’s now one of his favorite jackets!! Great addition to the collection!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Lawson

customer_reviews.title: very good and warm jacket
customer_reviews.text: I tried it in 0 degrees it was warm and cozy. I ware Large Regular but I ordered Medium and it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: The jacket keeps out the cold, even in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The jacket keeps out the cold, even in the single digit weather that we have experienced this month in Illinois. It does not feel bulky or heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Warm and light weight!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and warm. The zipper seems to be designed for left-handed, but not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: k_huang

customer_reviews.title: Great coat bad size
customer_reviews.text: The coat feels very worm but size is running very very big :(
customer_reviews.author: ZM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this jacket! Worked great when we went skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the jacket as a gift for my father. He loves it!! It is warm and fits perfectly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole J.

customer_reviews.title: Loose size
customer_reviews.text: Too much loose.. even I bought M size, looks like L. fabric is quite nice and strong, protects from cold weather even 0 C degree.
customer_reviews.author: Faruk

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Chose free shipping with an expected ship date of 5-6 days. Got it the next day! A little big but super warm. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It is delivered early from a plan and is satisfied because a product is a thing as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Seiichi Noguchi

customer_reviews.title: fits good, I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It is a very warm jacket, fits good, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, light weight and black color is good..update, it kept me warm in 20 degree temps so glad I purchased !
customer_reviews.text: Just received the coat 5 minutes ago. The medium size fits perfectly and I will be trying it out in 17 degree temperature tonight. Very nice, light weight and black color is good. If I freeze it will get one star.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD W JOHNSON

product_meta.title: Columbia Men's Pike Lake Jacket
product_meta.description: Our rugged and durable men's gear is tested tough by our own employees here in the Pacific Northwest, where every logger is bigger than the last.
feature_bullets: ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY: This men's water resistant trail jacket features our signature Omni-Heat Reflective Thermal Reflective Warmth that reflect body heat for ultimate warmth.
HANDY FEATURES: This men's insulated winter jacket features zippered hand pockets and an interior security pocket.
ADJUSTABLE FEATURES: This men's water resistant jacket features partial elastic, adjustable sleeve cuffs and a drawcord adjustable hem to fit your comfort needs.
CLASSIC FIT: This men's winter trail jacket has a classic fit.

Columbia Men's Pike Lake Jacket will become your favorite puffy. It features wide baffles packed with synthetic insulation and thermal-reflective lining make this jacket your go-to when temperatures drop.
